name: Meowtosis
description:
Ludum Dare 40 - Compo Entry - Meowtosis

So your dating a scientist and they have bought you home a present from the lab. A little kitty!!! Because of all the science that goes on at the lab the little kitty is bit odd… It has Mitosis. Try and take care of your cats for as long as you can… or figure out how to win the game :)

Please Be Aware this game was made in less than 24 hours and some of the controls may act up… Also if your movement freezes our does something weird press [Q] a couple of times.

Thanks for playing my game!!! - Mow
